text: (ai rasool) tum kah do ki vahee us par achchhee tarah qaaboo rakhata hai ki agar (chaahe to) tum par azaab tumhaare (sar ke) oopar se naazil kare ya tumhaare pov ke neeche se (uthaakar khada kar de) ya ek giroh ko doosare se bhida de aur tum mein se kuchh logon ko baaz aadamiyon kee ladaee ka maza chakha de zara gaur to karo ham kis kis tarah apanee aayaton ko ulat pulat ke bayaan karate hain taaki log samajhe
